question: What is context api
Answer: Context Provides a way to pass data through componet tree without having to pass props down manually at every level. In a typical React application data is passed top to down vai props but such usage can be cumbersome for certain types of props that are required by many components within an application. Context is desinged to share data that can be considered 'global' for a tree of React components such as the crrent authenticated user theme or perferred language. Context is primarily use when some data needs to be accessible by may components at differnt nesting leaves. Apply is sparingly because it makes componet reuse more difficault. If we only want ot avoid passing some props through many laves compponet composition is often a smpler solution than context. creates a context object. When React renders a component that subscribes to this context object it well read the current context value from the closest matching Provider abobe it in the tree. the defaultValue argument is only used when a component does not have matching Provider above it in the tree.
